articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Construction Site of Dental Hospital
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Construction Site of Dental Hospital
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave on-the-spot guidance to the construction site of the Dental Hospital near completion. 
					 He was accompanied by Han Kwang Sang, department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, and Pak Thae Song, Ma Won Chun and Ho Hwan Chol, vice department directors of the C.C., the WPK. 
					
					 Going round the construction site, he learnt in detail about the progress made in the construction and issues arising in it. 
					
					 He made the rounds of the main lobby, hallway, first aid treatment room, room for preparing material, dispensary, shop, etc. on the ground floor of the hospital. 
					
					 Going round the main lobby and hallway, he said he was pleased that lighting there is designed in such a way as to create a bright and quiet atmosphere. He stressed the need to prepare good furniture for them. 
					
					 He dropped in at the first aid treatment room where he was very pleased that those who suffer toothache may receive dental treatment any time.
					
					 Then he looked round the surgical department, internal department, pediatric treatment room and other places on the first floor. 
					
					 Going round every treatment room, he learned in detail about the construction work inside the hospital at the final phase. He said that the WPK prepared 30 sets of general dental equipment for the hospital, adding that when they are installed, at least 300 people may be treated in a day. 
					
					 He repeatedly stressed the need to use quality finishing materials not only for treatment rooms but for corridors and halls to be impeccable according to the design which he had already ratified. 
					
					 Looking at the children's amusement room in the lobby on the first floor, he said it would be liked by the parents who would visit the hospital together with their children. He instructed builders to finish the construction of the room in line with children's minds.
					
					 He went up to the second floor and looked round the meeting room and offices for dentists and nurses, etc. and told the officials to furnish the rooms well for them.
					
					 He was greatly satisfied with the construction, saying that the hospital has been constructed in a cozy way and he is pleased with everything. He named the hospital Ryugyong Dental Hospital. 
					
					 He set forth specific tasks to be fulfilled by the officials accompanying him and those in the field of public health to give finishing touches to the project and successfully operate the hospital.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the builders and officials of the relevant field would successfully complete the construction of Ryugyong Dental Hospital which would bring substantial benefits to people so that it may be opened on the occasion of the WPK's anniversary.

articles.title: Mongolian Delegation Pays Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Mongolian Delegation Pays Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- A Mongolian government economic trade delegation headed by Khaltmaa Battulga, minister of Industry and Agriculture, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Monday.
					 The guests placed a bouquet before the statues and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The delegation arrived here Monday to attend the 9th meeting of the consultative committee for economy, trade and science and technology between the DPRK and Mongolia.
					
					 On the same day the DPRK government hosted a reception for the delegation.

articles.title: Split of Korean Peninsula Causes Tension, Stand-off: Cyprian President
articles.content:
Split of Korean Peninsula Causes Tension, Stand-off: Cyprian President
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- The split of the Korean Peninsula imposed on the Koreans against their will causes escalation of tension and confrontation. Nicos Anastasiades, president of the Republic of Cyprus, said this when receiving credentials from Kim Chun Guk, DPRK ambassador to the country, on Sept. 16.
					 Touching on developing the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation, the president sincerely hoped for fresh success of the DPRK government and people in their efforts for social development, improvement of people's livelihood and national reunification.

articles.title: 2013 Nordic Ways Vasa China-DPRK Int'l Cycling Tourists Festival Held
articles.content:
2013 Nordic Ways Vasa China-DPRK Int'l Cycling Tourists Festival Held
 Rason, September 23 (KCNA) -- The 2013 Nordic Ways Vasa China-DPRK international cycling tourists festival took place here on Monday.
					 The tourists taking part in the festival from Sweden, Norway, Germany, Finland, UK and Switzerland cycled nearly 50 kilometers from the edge of bridge Wonjong to Haean Park in the city along the Wonjong-Rajin road.
					
					 They paid floral tribute before the mosaic depicting smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the city.
					
					 They held a meeting outside Haean Park on Monday as regards the end of the festival.
					
					 Present there were officials concerned, people in the city and tourists taking part in the festival.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 Jon Tong Chol, department director of the Rason City People's Committee, said that the DPRK would develop the friendly and cooperation relations with friendly countries on the principle of equality and mutual benefits and in the idea of independence, friendship and peace.
					
					 Dangawertwaagn, general manager of the Nordic Ways Vasa Company of Sweden, said that it is fortune for the tourists to visit Rason City and hold the cycling festival.
					
					 He expressed belief that the international exchanges for the development and activation of the Rason economic and trade zone and development of tour in the zone would be more briskly conducted in the future.
					
					 The tourists visited various places including the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Rason City and enjoyed an art performance given by kindergarteners.

articles.title: 27th Pyongyang Int'l Invitational Table Tennis Tournament Opens
articles.content:
27th Pyongyang Int'l Invitational Table Tennis Tournament Opens
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- The 27th Pyongyang International Invitational Table Tennis Tournament was opened with due ceremony at the Taekwon-Do Hall Monday.
					 It brought together teams from Indonesia, China and the DPRK (A and B groups).
					
					 They will compete in men's and women's team events and singles and doubles till Friday.
					
					 The ceremony was followed by men's and women's team events.

articles.title: Rajin-Khasan Railway Section Opens for Service
articles.content:
Rajin-Khasan Railway Section Opens for Service
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- The Rajin-Khasan railway section has been successfully rebuilt in line with the DPRK-Russia Moscow Declaration, signed in August 2001. The section was opened for service on Sunday.
					 Its opening serves as a landmark in promoting the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Russia, strengthening the economic and cultural ties in the Asia-Pacific region and ensuring the common prosperity of regional countries.
					
					 In the first year of the new century, historic meeting and talks were held between Kim Jong Il, leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, and V.V. Putin, president of the Russian Federation, resulting in the adoption of the DPRK-Russia Moscow Declaration.
					
					 The declaration expressed the will of the two countries to make every possible effort to carry into practice a plan for opening railway transit linking the DPRK, Russia and Europe. Such plan was the first phase for wide-ranging cooperation between the two countries, which came under spotlight of the world.
					
					 At that time some forces criticized the plan as a "daydream", displeased with significant cooperation between the two countries as well as peace and prosperity of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 However, the project plan went into practice in October 2008 on the eve of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of the bilateral diplomatic relations thanks to the unshakable will of the two countries and the active cooperation of their railway workers.
					
					 At the ground-breaking ceremony for the project, which was held in front of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Pavilion in the area of Tumangang Railway Station in Rason City, V. I. Yakunin, president of the Russian Railways Company, said that the world would soon witness the longest railway transit, extending more than 10 000 km, through which 100 000 containers would be transported annually from 2013.
					
					 At last, the Rajin-Khasan railway section has been successfully rebuilt this year marking the 65th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relation between the DPRK and Russia. This would bring a large-scale cooperation project between the two countries into practice, ensuring their and regional development and interests.
					
					 The railway section from Rajin to Khasan will be helpful to the economy, transport service and people's wellbeing of the two countries. It can also develop into an international transit between Asia and Europe.
					
					 The facts show the vitality of cooperation documents of the two countries, including the DPRK-Russia Moscow Declaration, and the noble idea carried in them.
					
					 The friendly and cooperative relationship between the DPRK and Russia will grow stronger with the geopolitical importance of Northeast Asia.

articles.title: 9th Pyongyang Autumn Int'l Trade Fair Opens
articles.content:
9th Pyongyang Autumn Int'l Trade Fair Opens
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- The 9th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair was opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House on Monday.
					 Present there were Kang Sok Ju, vice-premier of the Cabinet, officials in the trade field, delegations of foreign countries and regions, diplomatic envoys of different countries here and their embassy officials.
					
					 Pak Ung Sik, director of the Korean International Exhibition Corporation, made an opening address. Then followed a congratulatory speech by So Kil Bok, vice-minister of Foreign Trade.
					
					 The speakers said that the trade fair will offer a good occasion in promoting friendship and unity and boosting broad and multi-faceted economic trade, introducing goods and conducting scientific and technological exchange among countries.
					
					 They expressed their will to steadily expand and develop bilateral and multilateral cooperation in the fields of the economy and trade with foreign countries and regions on the principle of equality and mutual benefit.
					
					 Then the participants went round products displayed by companies of different countries and regions including the DPRK, Germany, Russia, Malaysia, Mongolia, Singapore, Italy, China, Cuba, Turkey and Taipei of China.
					
					 The trade fair will last till Thursday.

articles.title: Vol. 21 (Enlarged Edition) of "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" Off Press
articles.content:
Vol. 21 (Enlarged Edition) of "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" Off Press
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) Publishing House published Vol. 21 (enlarged edition) of "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il".
					 The book contains 46 letters, talks and answers to the questions put by foreign figures published from July, Juche 90 (2001) to August, Juche 92 (2003).
					
					 He in his works clarifies that the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea is an original political mode embodying the idea of attaching importance to arms and military affairs and gives lucid answers to issues concerning the essence, validity and vitality of the Songun politics and important matters arising in implementing it.
					
					 Indicated by works are tasks and ways for strengthening the People's Army, the main force for the Songun revolution.
					
					 Works also clarify the orientation and ways of bringing about a radical turn in the economic work of the country and in improving the people's living standard.
					
					 The book also contains works expounding ideas and theories of training more able scientific and technical personnel as required by the IT age in the new century and underscoring the need for the media persons to be loyal to the Songun revolutionary cause.
					
					 There are also works in the book which indicate tasks and ways for developing literature and arts. 
					
					 The book also contains works giving perfect answers to theoretical and practical issues arising in revolution and construction including the issue of preserving and managing historical and cultural relics, indicating tasks for strengthening the work of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and dealing with the foreign policy of the WPK.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams S. Korean Conservative Forces for Hurting Dignity of DPRK Supreme Leadership
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams S. Korean Conservative Forces for Hurting Dignity of DPRK Supreme Leadership
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- The ultra-right conservative forces of south Korea are moving to curb national reconciliation through hideous acts of slandering the dignity of the supreme leadership and social system of the DPRK.
					 The conservative media and riff-raffs talked rubbish about the "highlighted meaning of popular leader", hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. They even became vocal about "punishment", an act of pointing the finger at the sky.
					
					 This is a base act of hooligans bereft of elementary political idea and a hideous crime aimed to play a game of chance to escalate confrontation with the fellow countrymen even by staking the fate of the nation.
					
					 However precious the north-south ties are, they can never be compared with the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK which guarantees the destiny of the nation and the future of posterity.
					
					 The unified progress and prosperity of the nation including the improvement of the north-south ties, in particular, would be unthinkable apart from the dignity of the supreme leadership.
					
					 But the paid writers did hurt the dignity and rattled the nerve of the nation, a perfidious act of going against the nation.
					
					 The south Korean conservative forces' act of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK is getting all the more serious against the desire of the nation for mending the north-south ties.
					
					 It is none other than the south Korean puppet forces who staged large-scale anti-DPRK war exercises in collusion with outsiders and opened to public the plan for mounting precision strikes at monuments to the immortality of the leaders symbolic of the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK built in Pyongyang and other cities of the country.
					
					 Openly finding fault with the social system, economy and people's livelihood, they blustered that "the DPRK will get nothing from nuclear development and provocations" and "nothing can be expected unless it drops its nuclear ambition". 
					
					 The conservative media have systematically insulted the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK by mobilizing all possible means and methods, being unaware of what were uttered by them.
					
					 The north-south ties that progressed with dynamism again faced serious situation and deteriorated. The reason for this is that traitors including the right-wing conservative forces of south Korea have resorted to despicable and sordid anti-DPRK smear campaign.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, provocations against the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK is the most serious challenge to the party, state and people of the DPRK and the act of worst treachery which can make a mess of the future of the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK represents the life and soul of the nation.
					
					 The more desperately the puppet forces of south Korea may try to tarnish the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, the deeper they will fall into a bottomless abyss.
					
					 Nothing can ever be allowed to tarnish the dignity of the sun.

articles.title: Japan's Moves for Space Militarization Enter New Phase: News Analyst
articles.content:
Japan's Moves for Space Militarization Enter New Phase: News Analyst
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries have become intent on their moves to militarize the outer space.
					 As already known, Japan launched latest solid-fuel three-stage rocket Epsilon at the Uchinoura Space Center of the Aerospace Exploration Agency in Kagoshima Prefecture on September 14.
					
					 The rocket about 24 meters long uses solid fuel auxiliary propellant device of H-2A and the technology of M5 rocket.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that foreign media comment that the Epsilon has military aims.
					
					 The launch is 17 years since H-2A entered the phase of its full-fledged development in 1996 and 12 years since its 2001 maiden launch.
					
					 The launch is made in the wake of the formal decision by the experts' society of the government space policy committee in May this year on developing H-3 which will succeed prototype rocket H-2A. This points to the danger of Japan's moves to militarize space that has entered a new phase.
					
					 It is a well known fact that Japan has long pressed for space militarization.
					
					 After paving the way for getting involved in space rocket technology field under the 1969 agreement with the U.S. on cooperation in conquering space, Japan began building the public opinion in favor for the development of military satellite since 1985.
					
					 Since then it began using space for military purposes under the signboard of "civilian use", and the development of technical processes got into full swing.
					
					 This resulted in the development of solid-fuel rocket technology and the production of the first H-2A rocket in 2001.
					
					 The Chinese magazine World Affairs commented that Japan's space technology can be easily diverted to military use from civilian use, indicative of Japan's ambition to hold hegemony in space through actions.
					
					 Japan's ambition for space militarization has become undisguised.
					
					 Under the pretext of intensifying spying over the DPRK, Japan launched H-2A rockets with two spy satellites atop in 2003. It launched a total of four spy satellites by 2007, thereby establishing round-the-clock monitoring system.
					
					 At the end of May 2008, the Japanese authorities adopted the "basic law on space" allowing the military use of space under the pretext of "defensive purposes". Japan, therefore, has become unrestricted by 1969 Diet resolution which banned the use of space for military purposes.
					
					 The "basic law on space" allowed the development of space military technology and the "Self-Defence Forces" have become able to deploy high-performance spy satellites in space at will.
					
					 The "basic guidelines on development and use of space" in 2009 was followed by "basic space plan" aimed to spur the space militarization.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have reportedly worked out a plan to double the number of satellites for monitoring the earth for five to ten years beginning this year.
					
					 According to the plan, Japan will launch six more satellites for monitoring the earth to set up new satellite system separate from the system of information-gathering satellites.
					
					 The development of successor to H-2A signals the intention to launch new prototype rockets mounted with military satellites.
					
					 Japan is working hard to militarize space while watching for a chance for reinvasion, oblivious of its past when it was stigmatized as a war criminal state and a defeated nation. This arouses due vigilance of the international community.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to cool its head over-heated with ambition for reinvasion, mindful that it will fall into abyss of ruin should it run headlong into the road for military giant bereft of reason while going against the desire of humankind for peace.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Those Concerned of Opposition Party Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Those Concerned of Opposition Party Slammed
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- An article denouncing the south Korean puppet authorities' efforts to tide over their crisis through fascist crackdown was posted on the south Korean internet paper Voice of People on Sept. 17. 
					 It condemned the present chief executive of south Korea for evading the responsibility for the case of the Intelligence Service's interference in the "presidential election" and reviving the "yusin" rule and intensifying the suppression under the pretext of security.
					
					 It accused the regime of suppressing those concerned of an opposition party by bringing the alarming charge of the attempted rebellion to it in a bid to prevent the crisis from getting more serious due to the case of the IS.
					
					 It also noted that the "establishment of discipline" touted by the regime is nothing but a pretext for justifying its suppression of the forces standing in its way.
					
					 If such crackdown is allowed to go on, nobody knows who else will become such a political victim, it said.
					
					 The crackdown upon people will only lead the present regime to a self-destruction, it noted.
					
					 It called for actions against the regime's suppression of the opposition party and people of different social standings.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's "Theory of Principle" against Reunification under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's "Theory of Principle" against Reunification under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- If the south Korean regime persistently pursues confrontation with the DPRK with its "theory of principle", the north-south relations are bound to reach the worst phase and the regime will be only fated to suffer a humiliating ruin, says Rodong Sinmun in an article on Monday.
					 It is describing the hard-won atmosphere for improving the north-south relations as a fruition of its "confidence-building process" and "principled policy towards the north", and is crying out for "change" of the DPRK.
					
					 The conservative regime is misrepresenting the situation by twisting present inter-Korean ties with the "theory of principle", a clear revelation of its sinister attempt to pursue the "confrontation accompanied with dialogue".
					
					 If it defies the spirit of "By our nation itself", the idea of national independence and unity, and pursues dependence on outsiders and confrontation with compatriots, the inter-Korean ties are bound to fall short of improving.
					
					 Such actions as leveling a gun at the dialogue partner and talking nonsense about the fruition of the magnanimous and sincere efforts for dialogue by the DPRK to mislead the public opinion clearly prove that the south Korean regime's confrontation hysteria and provocative racket have reached the crafty and reckless phase.
					
					 The DPRK can never remain a passive onlooker to such practices.
					
					 It is entirely thanks to the sincere proposal for dialogue and positive efforts by the DPRK that the north-south ties have been in the orbit of dialogue and detente so far.
					
					 It is completely natural that the dialogue and negotiations will not help promote national reconciliation and unity now that the regime is abusing them for pursuing confrontation.
					
					 The DPRK wants to discuss with the south Korean authorities the issues of developing the north-south ties and achieving peace and prosperity but is not willing to show magnanimity and sincerity for the dialogue and negotiations for confrontation.

articles.title: S. Korean Society Ridden with Irregularities and Corruption
articles.content:
S. Korean Society Ridden with Irregularities and Corruption
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- South Korean newspapers are devoting much space everyday to articles dealing with "the detention of heavyweights and summons issued to them" for irregularities and corruption, stunning society. This reflects the real picture of the south Korean society rotten and ailing due to the misrule of the dictatorial regime.
					 It has been disclosed that Won Se Hun, the chief architect of the puppet Intelligence Service's interference in the election, received hundreds of millions of won from a construction businessman several times.
					
					 The bribery committed by the former director of the Office of Tax Administration is touching off resentment of people.
					
					 It has also been disclosed that a report on estimation was forged for delivery of parts for power station equipment despite their low quality. What is more deplorable is that bribes are paid at each phase after launching an investigation into the case. 
					
					 The project for improving the four large rivers started by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is ridden with all sorts of scandals.
					
					 Many businesses received larger amount of expenses from the authorities than the planned under the pretext of the project. Among them is a business which received more than 500 billion won. Most of the money went into the pocket of businessmen.  The project was thus carried out in a slipshod manner, causing serious consequences.
					
					 It has also been brought to light that the manager of a road company wrested a fabulous amount of money from construction businessmen.
					
					 It has recently been disclosed that a relative of the present chief executive expropriated hundreds of millions of won under the pretext of attraction of investment in real estate and transfer of business, becoming a target of criticism at home and abroad.
					
					 This is just a tip of iceberg of irregularities and corruption perpetrated under the dictatorial regime.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that south Korean media described the cases of bosses of the highest organs being questioned by prosecution for their scandals as commonplace. 
					
					 What merits a more attention is that scandals have become a social trend under the patronage of the authorities such that they reached an uncontrollable phase.
					
					 The sad story of the preceding regime which was called the "Cabinet of the rich" as it was made up of those who were tainted with scandals is now repeating itself under the present regime.
					
					 The puppet prime minister, minister of Defense, minister of Creation of Future and Science, director of the Constitutional Court, chairman of the Fair Trade Committee, director of the Minor Enterprises Agency, vice prime minister of Economy, vice-minister of Justice and other nominees tipped by the present chief executive had to step  down for their involvement in scandals before taking office. This was something unprecedented in the history of puppet politics.
					
					 The present chief executive disbanded even the central investigation headquarters of the Supreme Prosecutor's Office which looked after irregularities and corruption in name only.
					
					 There are comments that the rate of the authorities' discovery and punishment of officials involved in scandals is very low.
					
					 It is needless to say that all fabrics of society are ridden with scandals.
					
					 Some days ago, the puppet Administration Institute presented survey results that it has become a practice for businessmen to pay bribes for business dealings and this has become a basic factor of corruption among officials.
					
					 It has become a common practice for government employees of administration organs to receive bribes for dealing with suits filed by civilians.
					
					 Irregularities and corruption are prevalent in the educational and health fields and other evil doings are rampant in pursuit of profits.
					
					 A government official warned that scandals are commonplace in south Korean society, reaching a danger line. This proves the gravity of the situation.
					
					 Scandals spread like a cancer in all fabrics of south Korean society under the reign of dictatorial forces, suffocating everybody.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Kyrgyzstan
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was brought out in booklet by the Yvsh-Ata Publishing House in Kyrgyzstan on Sept. 9.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It indicates tasks to be fulfilled to firmly defend and preserve the ideas and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and eternally glorify them.

articles.title: Day of Songun Celebrated by World Progressives
articles.content:
Day of Songun Celebrated by World Progressives
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- World progressives significantly celebrated in deep reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il the 53rd Day of Songun when Kim Jong Il started the Songun revolution on August 25, 1960.
					 Before and after the Day of Songun foreign media widely introduced the undying exploits of Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper The Daily Folk, TVONE broadcasting service of Indonesia, the Russian internet magazine Mar 12, the Nigerian paper Nigerian Observer, internal and international broadcasting services of Guinea, the internet website of the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK and other media reported that Kim Jong Il inspected the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960, a reflection of his will to lead the revolution and construction by relying on the KPA.
					
					 The international community received supreme leader Kim Jong Un's talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution."  The talk was published in Rodong Sinmun, organ of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Joson Inmingun, organ of the Korean People's Army, on the Day of Songun which falls on August 25, Juche 102 (2013).
					
					 Xinhua News of China, ITAR-TASS of Russia, the Russian paper Patriot, Kyodo News of Japan, the Iranian paper Iran News, the paper of Democratic Congo L'Avenir, C. Equis 36 Radio Centenario of Uruguay and other media and internet websites of various countries reported or posted the full text or gist of the historic talk of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Joint statements were made public by the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, and statements by the honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, the chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz EL" Republican Political Party of Kyrgyzstan, a member of the Central Executive Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, the president of the Socialist Party of Benin and the chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					
					 Colorful political and cultural events such as meetings, seminars, photo exhibitions and film shows took place in many countries to significantly celebrate the Day of Songun. They included the meetings to explain the talk of Kim Jong Un and reading sessions in the presence of officials of governments, political parties, organizations and institutions and international and regional bodies and many other people from all walks of life.
					
					 Celebrations of the 53rd Day of Songun in different parts of the world showed that Kim Jong Il was a peerlessly illustrious commander of Songun to be looked up to by all people for all ages as he demonstrated to the world the dignity and might of the country by dint of Songun.

articles.title: DPRK Praised by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
DPRK Praised by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special write-ups from Sept. 3 to 12 to mark the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The Uruguayan paper La Juventud allotted one whole page to an article titled "Founder of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" with a photo of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The President advanced a nation-building line corresponding with the situation in Korea after its liberation and finally founded the DPRK, the first people's democratic country in the East, on Sept. 9 1948, the paper said, and went on:
					
					 In less than 2 years after the foundation of the DPRK the U.S. imperialists ignited the Korean War. It defeated the U.S. imperialists who had boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and won a great victory in the war. It pushed ahead with socialist construction at several stages in the wake of the post-war rehabilitation and construction and socialist revolution.
					
					 The Guinean paper Horoya carried special write-ups on its one whole page illustrated with a photo of supreme leader Kim Jong Un standing in the tribune of honor at Kim Il Sung Square.
					
					 The paper introduced the invincible might of the DPRK in the articles titled "Political, Ideological and Military Power" and "Towards Economic Power" under the headline of "DPRK Today".
					
					 The Libyan paper February reported that the DPRK is dignified with its independent politics, mighty with self-supporting economy and ever-victorious with self-reliant defence capabilities, carrying a photo of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un leads the DPRK, which will shine as an independent power.
					
					 An Angolan paper carried a photo of Kim Jong Un and an article marking the DPRK's birth anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion del Complejo de Piscinas de Recreacion de Munsu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion del Complejo de Piscinas de Recreacion de Munsu
Pyongyang, 23 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, volvio a recorrer el campo de construccion del Complejo de Piscinas de Recreacion de Munsu.
					Los constructores militares entraron en la etapa final de la obra en acato al llamamiento del Comandante Supremo a terminarla hasta el 10 de octubre, dia de fundacion del PTC, y trabajan intensamente ahora de dia a noche.
					
					En el hall central de la piscina bajo techo donde se colocara una estatua de pie del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el Mariscal elogio un panorama de playa en ese lugar, hecho por la Casa de Creacion Mansudae gestionando bien la escenografia.
					
					Llegado a la piscina bajo techo con toboganes, dijo que es excelente y bien soleada y agrego que seria mejor si los pilares de tobogan se pintaran de blanco.
					
					Instruyo colocar un reloj de gran tamano en la pared de la piscina e instalar los equipos de audio para alegrar a los visitantes con buenas musicas.
					
					En el vestuario, indico los detalles para asegurar al maximo el confort de los clientes, en particular, instalar espejos y colocar secadores de pelo y enseno formar bien el pendiente para que el agua no quede estancada en el suelo.
					
					Instruyo amueblar bien con mesas de juego y otros el balcon de restaurante y otros lugares de la piscina.
					
					En el gimnasio bajo techo, dijo que esta facilidad no estuvo proyectada en el diseno inicial, pero en acato a la orden del Comandante Supremo, los constructores militares lo edificaron bien en un corto plazo.
					
					Fue muy buena la edificacion de este gimnasio en la piscina bajo techo, senalo y agrego que el EPC cumple todo lo que se le ordene. 
					
					Prosiguio que si acondicionan aqui las canchas de voleibol y baloncesto y la plancha elastica, les gustarian mucho a los jovenes y ninos.
					
					En la piscina al aire libre, vio con satisfaccion las paredes en que se dibujan las gotas de agua, gaviotas, delfines y otros.
					
					Recorriendo varios puntos de la piscina al aire libre, reconocio de modo detallado el estado de montaje de toboganes de varios tipos y los estanques y evaluo que marcha bien este trabajo.
					
					Hay que instalar la sala de primeros auxilios y el puesto de vigilancia y tomar las medidas de rescate, dijo y continuo que esas condiciones son indispensables para la inauguracion.
					
					Destaco la importancia de tomar las medidas de proteccion del complejo en la estacion invernal.
					
					Evaluo el hecho de que la obra se realiza en el principio de reducir al maximo el consumo de electricidad con recursos geotermicos.
					
					Subrayo que deben sembrar en la piscina y los alrededores los arboles de buena variedad y formar mas areas de cesped.
					
					Los constructores hicieron muchos trabajos en unos dias, senalo y continuo que le complace mucho si piensa en la zona de Munsu que se cambiaria mucho cuando sea inaugurado el complejo.
					
					La transformacion de la zona de Munsu es un milagro que puede crear solo el EPC dispuesto a cumplir incondicional y absolutamente las tareas que le asigne el partido, dijo apreciando de nuevo los meritos de constructores.
					
					Le acompanaron el miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, Choe Ryong Hae, el miembro del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC, Jang Song Thaek, y los subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Thae Song y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre el campo de construccion del Club de Equitacion de Mirim
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre el campo de construccion del Club de Equitacion de Mirim
Pyongyang, 23 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio el campo de construccion del Club de Equitacion de Mirim en etapa final.
					Estuvo en el campo de entrenamiento de equitacion bajo techo, el servicio de equitacion, la graderia al aire libre, el campo de entrenamiento en forma circular, la escuela de equitacion, los establos y otros puntos averiguando como marcha la construccion.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los constructores militares edificaran cualitativamente en etapa final varios establecimientos del club conforme a la demanda del diseno y a la normativa de construccion.
					
					En particular, se puso contento de que se construyeran rapido el instituto de reproduccion y el hospital veterinario en cumplimiento de sus instrucciones dadas en su visita realizada en agosto pasado.
					
					Averiguo en detalles como se construyen las pistas de tierra y cesped.
					
					Contemplo satisfecho la cerca de arboles formada a lo largo de las pistas de tierra y dijo que seria mas vistoso si plantaran acacias en la linea interior de las pistas.
					
					Tras informarse de que las pistas de tierra fueron tratadas con la famosa piedra granulosa de Kaesong, mezclada con sal, a fin de mejorar la capacidad de conservacion de humedad y los efectos esterilizantes, subrayo que deben tomar estrictas medidas para facilitar el confort a los jinetes en todo lo posible.
					
					Viendo las pistas de cesped, instruyo que el cesped de Songchon es el mejor para las pistas de equitacion.
					
					El Mariscal hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de formacion de areas verdes.
					
					Contemplando el club desde el monte artificial, dijo que sera mejor sembrar en el lugar los arboles coniferos como abeto y los otros con anchas hojas como arce, combinandolos con arbustos floriferos.
					
					Anadio que en los alrededores del lago artificial con cascada artificial y arena, hay que sembrar los sauces para hermosear el paisaje.
					
					Agrego que deben acondicionar el camino de paseo en caballo y los miradores para que los visitantes descansen bien.
					
					Enfatizo que deben seguir impulsando la repoblacion forestal aun despues de terminada la obra.
					
					Senalo que deben prepararse para la operacion del club, ya que la construccion entro en etapa final.
					
					Diciendo que faltan pocos dias hasta el dia de fundacion del PTC, el Comandante Supremo expuso la esperanza y conviccion de que los constructores militares terminaran incondicionalmente en el plazo previsto la construccion del club, regalo de nuestro partido para el pueblo.
					
					Le acompanaron el miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, Choe Ryong Hae, el miembro del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC, Jang Song Thaek, y los subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Thae Song y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias a Enrique Pena Nieto
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias a Enrique Pena Nieto
Pyongyang, 23 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 22 un mensaje de condolencias al presidente de los Estados Unidos Mexicanos, Enrique Pena Nieto.
					En su misiva, el remitente expreso profunda compasion y condolencias al destinatario y por su conducto, al gobierno y pueblo mexicanos y a los familiares de las victimas del reciente tifon que azoto varias regiones de Mexico causando grandes perdidas humanas y materiales.
					
					Deseo que el destinatario y el gobierno mexicano eliminen lo mas pronto posible las consecuencias del desastre natural y estabilicen la vida de los habitantes de zonas atacadas.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun remite mensaje de condolencias a su homologo mexicano
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun remite mensaje de condolencias a su homologo mexicano
Pyongyang, 23 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El canciller de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Ui Chun, envio el dia 22 un mensaje de condolencias a su homologo mexicano Antonio Meade Curibrena en relacion con las perdidas humanas y materiales por fuerte tifon en Mexico.
					La misiva expresa a los damnificados y sus familiares una profunda simpatia y condolencias y manifiesta conviccion de que tales desastres naturales se eliminen cuanto antes por los esfuerzos activos del gobierno y el pueblo de Mexico.

articles.title: Inaugurada la linea ferroviaria Rajin-Jasan
articles.content:
Inaugurada la linea ferroviaria Rajin-Jasan
Rason, 22 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada la linea ferroviaria Rajin-Jasan, que hara gran aporte al desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Rusia.
					La ceremonia de inauguracion tuvo lugar el dia 22 en la ciudad de Rajin.
					
					Asistieron a la ocasion el ministro del Ferrocarril, Jon Kil Su, el viceministro de Comercio Exterior, O Ryong Chol, el vicepresidente del Comite Estatal para el Desarrollo Economico, Ri Chol Sok, el presidente del Comite Popular de la ciudad de Rason, Jo Jong Ho, el consul general coreano en Najodka, Im Chon Il, y otros funcionarios de la rama de ferrocarril junto con trabajadores de la ciudad de Rason.
					
					Tambien estuvieron presentes el presidente de la Compania Ferrocarril Ruso, V. I. Yakunin, el viceministro de Transporte, Alexei Tsijenov, el primer subgobernador de la Administracion del Territorial Litoral, Serguei Sidorov, el embajador ruso en Corea Alexandr Timonin, el consul general ruso en Chongjin, Vyacheslav Tsupikov, funcionarios de la rama y los huespedes rusos, asi como los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises en Corea.
					
					En su discurso, Yakunin dijo que la linea Jasan-Rajin fue inaugurada conforme a la Declaracion Rusia-Corea de Moscu firmada en 2001 por los maximos dirigentes de ambos paises.
					
					Anadio que la continuacion del proyecto comun para la modernizacion de todo el ferrocarril que atraviesa a Corea contribuiria mucho al desarrollo de la cooperacion economica en la region de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					Jon Kil Su enfatizo en su discurso que el plan de la union de las ferrovias de Corea y Rusia es ejemplo del gran proyecto de cooperacion bilateral conveniente al desarrollo e intereses comunes de los pueblos de dos paises.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que operara con exito la modernizada linea Rajin-Jasan en el principio de respeto mutuo y cooperacion entre los dos paises en el sector.
					
					Hubo palabras de felicitacion.
					
					La ceremonia fue terminada con la interpretacion de los himnos de dos paises.
					
					El mismo dia, se ofrecio un banquete con motivo de la ceremonia inaugural.

Inaugurada IX Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Otonal de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 23 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 23 en la capitalina Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones la IX exposicion internacional de mercancias otonal de Pyongyang.
					En la ceremonia de inauguracion estuvieron presentes el vicepremier Kang Sok Ju y los funcionarios de la rama de comercio exterior, las delegaciones de varios paises y regiones, los representantes diplomaticos y otros integrantes de las embajadas de varios paises en Corea.

					Subrayaron que en el futuro tambien, la RPDC seguira ampliando y desarrollando en la rama de economia y comercio la cooperacion bilateral y multilateral con varios paises y regiones del mundo en el principio de igualdad y beneficio mutuo.

articles.title: Festival internacional de turismo en bicicleta China-Corea de Nordic Ways Vasa de 2013
articles.content:
Festival internacional de turismo en bicicleta China-Corea de Nordic Ways Vasa de 2013
Rason, 23 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 23 en esta ciudad el festival internacional de turismo en bicicleta China-Corea de Nordic Ways Vasa de 2013.
					Los turistas ciclistas de Suecia, Noruega, Alemania, Finlandia, Gran Bretana y Suiza recorrieron en bicicleta un trayecto de casi 50km desde el muelle de Wonjong hasta el Parque Haean siguiendo la carretera Wonjong-Rajin.
					
					Ellos depositaron ramos de flores ante los murales de mosaico con imagenes sonrientes del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, erguidos en la ciudad de Rason, y les rindieron tributo.
					
					Este dia, los miembros del turismo internacional celebraron un acto frente al Parque Haean con motivo del fin de festival.
					
					Participaron en la ocasion los funcionarios interesados, los trabajadores de la ciudad y los turistas ciclistas.
					
					En el acto hubo discursos.
					
					El director del comite popular de la ciudad de Rason, Jon Tong Chol, senalo que bajo el ideal de la independencia, la amistad y la paz, la RPDC desarrollara en el principio de igualdad y beneficio mutuo las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con los paises amistosos.
					
					El director general de la Compania de Nordic Ways Vasa, Dangawertwaagn, senalo que fue una fortuna para los turistas ciclistas visitar la ciudad de Rason y realizar el festival de turismo en bicicleta.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que se ampliara en el futuro el intercambio internacional para el desarrollo y activacion de la zona economica y comercial de Rason y el desarrollo de turismo.
					
					Por otra parte, los huespedes visitaron el invernadero de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias y otros lugares de la ciudad y presenciaron una funcion artistica infantil.

articles.title: Ofensores a la maxima dignidad de la RPDC lo pagaran muy caro, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
Ofensores a la maxima dignidad de la RPDC lo pagaran muy caro, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 23 de septiembre (ACNC) -- A instigacion de la camarilla titere del Sur de Corea, los medios venales libran una demagogia sobre la dignidad de la Direccion Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El pasado dia 21, YTN y otros medios conservadores difundieron un rumor como la supuesta "ejecucion" y "encubrimiento" haciendose eco del reporte de Asahi Shimbun de Japon, en el cual se atrevieron a censurar la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					El mismo dia, la cadena CBS divulgo otro despacho intrigante, segun el cual se impuso a todos los habitantes de la RPDC presentar la nota de introspeccion para que juren de nuevo la fidelidad al lider y al Partido del Trabajo.
					
					El dia 19, censuraron los autografos del Mariscal Kim Jong Un al pie de las cartas enviadas por habitantes y ninos, que constituyen la prueba de su noble amor al pueblo, como "firmas para dar destaque al significado del lider para el pueblo".
					
					Esas versiones constituyen una provocacion imperdonable contra la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y crimen abominable que puede ser cometido solo por los maniacos de enfrentamiento sin comparacion.
					
					?Como se puede ofender con embustes al Sol venerado y respetado por todos los coreanos?
					
					En el mundo no hubo antes otra banda de bribones como la camarilla titere surcoreana que se atreve a difamar hasta la maxima dignidad de la nacion.
					
					El presente caso es el ultimo coletazo de los que estan atemorizados ante el avance del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea, que comienzan la era de prosperidad bajo la guia del gran hombre sin par, para manchar la imagen de la RPDC y destruir la unidad monolitica de esta.
					
					Nadie prestara oidos a los disparates de los enloquecidos por el enfrentamiento con la RPDC.
					
					Cuanto mas la banda surcoreana difame la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, tanto mas se expondra su cronico atributo conflictivo. 
					
					Hoy dia, las relaciones intercoreanas enfrentan nuevamente la grave situacion, lo que se debe enteramente a la banda surcoreana que instiga a sus lacayos de la prensa a lanzar la demagogia con embustes y fraudes.
					
					Ahora, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea estan muy indignados por ese crimen y se llenan del animo de venganza.
					
					No se puede opacar con la palmada los rayos luminosos del Sol del Songun.
					
					Si la banda de conservadores surcoreanos sigue ofendiendo la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, correra el tragico destino de los sujetos echados al basurero de la historia.
					
					Como han declarado, nuestro ejercito y pueblo castigaran sin piedad a cualesquier difamadores de nuestra maxima dignidad.
					
					Esos ultimos lo pagaran muy caro.

articles.title: Entra en nueva fase militarizacion espacial de Japon
articles.content:
Entra en nueva fase militarizacion espacial de Japon
Pyongyang, 23 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, los reaccionarios japoneses impulsan con mas afan la militarizacion del cosmos.
					Como ya trascendidos, fue lanzada el dia 14 la unidad no.1 de Epsilon, cohete de combustible solido de nuevo tipo de fabricacion japonesa, desde el centro espacial de Uchinoura de la Agencia de Exploracion Aeroespacial en Kagoshima.
					
					Epsilon, cohete de 3 cuerpos, tiene casi 24 metros de largo y utiliza el aparato de propulsion auxiliar del cohete de combustible solido H-2A y la tecnologia del cohete M5.
					
					No es casual que las fuentes extranjeras calificaran al Epsilon como cohete de fines militares.
					
					El lanzamiento de Epsilon se realizo al cabo de 17 anos y 12 anos desde el inicio del desarrollo de H-2A en 1996 y su primer lanzamiento en 2001, respectivamente.
					
					La realidad demuestra la gravedad de la militarizacion espacial del pais isla que entro en nueva fase.
					
					Al firmar ya en 1969 con Estados Unidos el tratado sobre la cooperacion en la conquista del cosmos, Japon abrio la posibilidad de penetrar en el sector de tecnicas de cohetes espaciales y en 1985, comenzo a crear la opinion publica a favor del desarrollo de satelites militares.
					
					Desde aquel ano, procedio al desarrollo de proceso tecnico para aprovechar el cosmos con fines militares bajo el pretexto de "uso civil".
					
					Asi se desarrollo la tecnica de cohete de combustible solido e hizo su debut en el 2001 el primer cohete H-2A.
					
					La revista china World Affairs senalo que la tecnica espacial de Japon es facilmente convertible desde el uso civil al uso militar, lo cual muestra su ambicion de tomar hegemonia en el cosmos.
					
					Bajo el pretexto de intensificar el espionaje sobre la RPDC, Japon lanzo en 2003 el cohete H-2A cargado de 2 satelites espias y establecio el sistema de vigilancia de 24 horas al lanzar 4 satelites en total hasta el ano 2007.
					
					A finales de mayo de 2008, las autoridades japonesas aprobaron la "ley basica del espacio" y asi dejaron de ser comprometidas con la resolucion de la Dieta aprobada en 1969 que prohibe el uso militar del cosmos.
					
					En virtud de esa ley, las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" pudieron desplegar a su antojo en el cosmos sus satelites de espionaje de alta eficiencia.
					
					En 2009, se ha publicado la "guia basica sobre el desarrollo y uso del espacio", seguida del "plan basico del espacio" que expuso el intento de acelerar la militarizacion del cosmos.
					
					Segun reportes, los reaccionarios japoneses trazaron el plan de duplicar dentro de 5-10 anos desde el ano en curso el numero de satelites de vigilancia de la Tierra.
					
					En ese contexto, estructuraran nuevo sistema de satelites al lanzar otros 6 satelites aparte del otro ya en funcionamiento para la recogida de informaciones.
					
					Desarrollar los sucesores de H-2A significa lanzar nuevos cohetes matrices y muchos satelites militares cargados en ellos.
					
					Suscita la precaucion de la sociedad internacional la conducta de Japon que esta desesperado para militarizar el cosmos asechando solamente la oportunidad de reagresion olvidadizo de su condicion de pais criminal y derrotado en la segunda guerra mundial.
					
					El pais isla debe parar sus pasos hacia la militarizacion del cosmos dejando de desafiar a la aspiracion de la humanidad a la paz.

articles.title: CRPP condena acciones conflictivas de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
CRPP condena acciones conflictivas de autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 23 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Como se ha informado el dia 21, fueron aplazados por tiempo indefinido el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados en el Norte y el Sur de Corea, programado con motivo de Chusok (15 de agosto lunar), y las conversaciones de trabajo entre las autoridades de ambas partes para el reinicio del turismo al monte Kumgang.
					En su informacion no.1042 fechada 22, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) subrayo que el presente caso es producto de la brutal campana de confrontacion fratricida de la banda titere surcoreana, que difamo e insulto los esfuerzos magnanimos y sinceros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea por mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y su voluntad de dialogo y obstaculizo intencionalmente la reconciliacion nacional y la mejora de relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					La responsabilidad recae totalmente sobre los conservadores surcoreanos, reitera el documento y prosigue:
					
					Ahora, todos los coreanos del Norte y el Sur estan muy indignados de la camarilla titere surcoreana que hizo volver las relaciones intercoreanas al enfrentamiento y a la agravacion de tensiones.
					
					Para eludir la responsabilidad, la banda surcoreana publico apresuradamente la llamada "declaracion sobre el Norte" en nombre del vocero del Ministerio de Unificacion, a traves de la cual expreso "lastima" e insistio en que "se ha esforzado por normalizar las relaciones construyendo la confianza en el espiritu de reconocimiento reciproco y paz".
					
					Para colmo, calumnio nuestra justa medida y advertencia como "acto antietico" y se refirio a la "respuesta rotunda" y a la "sancion internacional y fuerte represalia", exponiendo nuevamente su naturaleza conflictiva.
					
					Esos dichos parten del intento antinacional de bloquear la corriente a la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas al fomentar la antipatia y la aversion a la RPDC.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos hablan ruidosamente de la supuesta "solucion del problema humanitario" acusando a la RPDC.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no tienen cara para abordar ese tema.
					
					Como conoce bien todo el mundo, en el anterior "regimen" surcoreano cuando la confrontacion Norte-Sur llego al extremo, se ha celebrado en dos ocasiones en el monte Kumgang el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados gracias a la iniciativa y esfuerzos de la RPDC.
					
					Dado que crece en el Sur de Corea el clima de reunificacion pacifica, la banda titere instigo a los medios conservadores y connotados elementos conflictivos a lanzar una demagogia describiendo el cierto avance en las relaciones N-S como "resultado del proceso de confianza de la Peninsula Coreana" y "fruto de la doctrina de mantenimiento de principios".
					
					Por otra parte, recurrio a los ejercicios militares y a la campana contra "fuerzas pro-Norte y procomunistas", navegando asi contra la corriente de mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Es una violacion e insulto al humanitarismo el hecho de que los belicistas surcoreanos hablaran de la supuesta "etica" introduciendo en su territorio muchos equipos belicos mortiferos y realizando los ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC.
					
					Si bien deseamos la solucion de los problemas pendientes entre el Norte y el Sur, inclusive labores humanitarias, y el mejoramiento de relaciones bilaterales, no podemos tolerar las acciones conflictivas que ofenden nuestra dignidad y orgullo.
					
					El futuro de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas depende totalmente de la actitud que asuman las autoridades surcoreanas.
